Head.Name: Brigandine
Head.Description: A jacket or doublet with many small, overlapping metal plates rivited to it. The plates may be between layers of cloth or exposed in the front of the armor

Torso.Name: Brigandine
Torso.Description: A jacket or doublet with many small, overlapping metal plates rivited to it. The plates may be between layers of cloth or exposed in the front of the armor

RightHand.Name: Mace
RightHand.Description: A one-handed metal club. Often weighted at the end to increase impact

Backpack.Name: Long Sword
Backpack.Description: A larger sword, intended to be used with two hands

Backpack.Name: Manacles
Backpack.Description: Wrist and/or ankle bindings connected with a strong chain. Kinky!

Backpack.Name: Shovel
Backpack.Description: A tool for digging through the earth. Can you dig it?

Backpack.Name: Face Paint
Backpack.Description: You could disguise yourself as anyone who also wears face paint!
